name: The Clean Dream Team Set
about: What it is: A 4-step routine of best-sellers -with a full size Resurfacing Mask - that cleanses, refines, treats and hydrates for bouncy, radiant, healthy skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Highlighted Ingredients:.- White Willow Bark: A natural BHA that helps clear buildup to minimize the look of clogged pores..- AHA Super Fruit Blend: Lactic, glycolic, citric, malic, and tartaric acids help transform the look of dullness..- Orange Peptides and Pomegranate Spheres: Form a hydrating, breathable barrier for a silicone-free smoothing effect...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: More Clean. More Complex. More Effective. This is a 4-step routine of travel-friendly best-sellers - including a full size Resurfacing Mask! - that cleanse, refine, treat, and hydrate u2013 giving you everything you need for bouncy, radiant, and healthy-looking skin...This Set Contains:.- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Regenerating Cleanser.- 1 oz/ 30 mL Resurfacing Mask.- 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Resurfacing Serum.- 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Water-Lock Moisturizer...
ingredients: -White Willow Bark: A natural BHA that helps clear buildup to minimize the look of clogged pores..-AHA Super Fruit Blend: Lactic, glycolic, citric, malic, and tartaric acids help Oxide), Alcohol, Limonene, Citral, Linalool...Resurfacing Mask:.Hordeum Vulgare Leaf Juice*, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Sclerotium Gum, Lactobacillus Ferment, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate, how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently buff Regenerating Cleanser onto clean, dry skin. Rinse off with warm water. Use AM and PM..-Apply Resurfacing Mask onto clean, dry skin. Leave on for 15 to 20 minutes, then rinse off with warm water. Use one to three times a week..-Massage Resurfacing Serum onto face and neck. Use AM and PM..-Massage Water-Lock Moisturizer onto face and neck. Use AM and PM.
